channel.title: Comics on MythWeaver

item.title: Darkest Garfield Story Ever
item.description: Published on October 23-28, 1989, Garfield comic strips are shown as the darkest and most interesting story in 45 years of Garfield history. Garfield confronts the existential fear of loneliness and lost in time and cannot accept it…
